entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
